name: Ninja Gaiden Engine Remake
description:
A remake of the physics and combat from the original NES Ninja Gaiden featuring the same/ similar frame data for attacking, jumping and most importantly, cancelled lag when landing from an aerial attack. Featuring buttery smooth physics and controls.

Controls are: A,D to move, O to attack, Enter to reset and Q and E to modify the gravity of the level.

Made in GameMaker 1.4

All artwork is original except for the player character who is clearly a lemming.
